<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Payment Consent Reject Request","required":["rejectionReason"],"type":"object","properties":{"rejectionReason":{"description":"Payment Consent Rejection reason object","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"description":"Recurring Consent Rejection Reason Code","enum":["NAO_INFORMADO","FALHA_INFRAESTRUTURA","TEMPO_EXPIRADO_AUTORIZACAO","REJEITADO_USUARIO","CONTAS_ORIGEM_DESTINO_IGUAIS","CONTA_NAO_PERMITE_PAGAMENTO","SALDO_INSUFICIENTE","VALOR_ACIMA_LIMITE"],"type":"string","title":"RecurringConsentRejectionReasonCode"},"detail":{"description":"Additional Inforamtion regarding the rejection.","type":"string","title":"ConsentRejectionReasonDetail"}},"title":"RecurringConsentRejectionReason"}},"title":"PaymentRejectRecurringConsentRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
